import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import Message from '../../components/message/message.component'; import CheckoutSteps from '../../components/checkout-steps/checkout-steps.component'; const PlaceOrderPage = () => { const dipatch = useDispatch(); const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) return ( <>

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? Your cart is empty : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty} * {item.price} ))} ) }

Order Summary

 Items ${cart.itemsPrice} ) } export default PlaceOrderPage
